purpleculture_info:
(Simplified: 县)
Ideographic: District 県 borders 系; 県 also provides the pronunciation
purpleculture_examples:
縣委 [ xiàn wěi ]: CCP county committee
縣城 [ xiàn chéng ]: county seat; county town
縣政府 [ xiàn zhèng fǔ ]: county administration; county regional government
縣官 [ xiàn guān ]: district magistrate; county magistrate
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 県 [ xiàn ] county, district, subdivision
    • 系 [ xì ] system; line, link, connection
heisig_chinese_memo: This special county has done a lot of work with DNA to help men with small tools to get bigger ones.
Kanshudo_mnemonic: system (系) of prefectures (県) = prefecture
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: One county that doesn't like another builds a wall for separation.  You can imagine the eyes of the residents when someone from the other side hops over the wall to see what's going on.
humanum_full_description_en:
"Said Wen": "County, department. From department to hold 𥄉." Xu Xuan said: "This is originally a county linked to a county, borrowed as a county from a prefecture and county. Taken."

Bronze inscriptions are used as the original meaning of hanging, and the bell: "The big bell is the county". It also means that the ancient administrative division unit, Shu Yizhong: "Its counties are 200." Also used as a surname.
humanum_short_description_en: Inscriptions from the " wood " from " lines " from the " head ", or from " head " from the " head " to " head " (eye) on behalf of the head. The whole character image is in the form of hanging the head (head) on the wood. The original meaning is hanging.
humanum_full_description:
《說文》：「縣，繫也。从系持𥄉。」徐鉉曰：「此本是縣挂之縣，借為州縣之縣。今俗加心，別作懸，義無所取。」

　　金文用作本義，表示懸掛，郘鐘：「大鐘既縣」。又表示古代的行政區劃單位，叔夷鐘：「其縣二百」。又用作姓氏。
humanum_short_description: 金文從「木」從「系」從「首」，或不從「首」而從「目」，以「目」(眼睛)代表頭部。全字象懸掛首級(人頭)於木上之形，本義是懸掛。

It also means that the ancient administrative division unit, Shu Yizhong: "Its counties are 200." Also used as a surname.

縣字的基本解释

縣
xiàn

縣
xuán
均见“县”。

縣字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xuán］
［《廣韻》胡涓切，平先，匣。］
亦作“県1”。“县1”的繁体字。
(1)挂。
(2)古称悬挂的乐器，如钟磬等。
(3)悬钟磬之具。
(4)维系；拴系；系联。
(5)差距；远。
(6)揭示；颁立。
(7)悬赏。
(8)秤锤。
(9)称量；衡量。
(10)祭名。
(11)姓。春秋时有县成。见《史记·仲尼弟子列传》。
[②]［xiàn］
［《廣韻》黄練切，去霰，匣。］
亦作“県2”。“县2”的繁体字。
(1)古称天子所居之地。
(2)地方行政区划名。周时已有县邑。春秋时期秦、晋、楚等大国将兼并土地置县，故县多在边地。后各国将县制内移，边远地置郡。秦统一六国后，始以郡统县，历代因之。隋唐以后，县隶于府或州。辛亥革命后，直隶于省、特别区。解放后，或隶属于省、自治区、直辖市，或隶于自治州、省辖市。
(3)谓以其地为县。
(4)引申为侵占别国土地。
(5)县官。
(6)特指赤县。

縣字的康熙字典解释

【未集中】【糸字部】　縣； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页934第23
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?胡涓切，音懸。【說文】繫也。【註】徐鉉曰：此本是縣挂之縣，借爲州縣之縣。今俗加心，別作懸，義無所取。【易·繫辭】縣象著明，莫大乎日月。【詩·周頌】應田縣鼓。【周禮·春官·小胥】正樂縣之位。【儀禮·燕禮】樂人縣。【左傳·成二年】曲縣繁纓以朝。【前漢·高帝紀】縣隔千里。　又【廣韻】黃練切【集韻】熒絹切，?音炫。【正韻】形甸切，音現。【釋名】縣，懸也，懸係于郡也。【廣韻】古作寰。楚莊王滅陳爲縣，縣名自此始。【周禮·天官·大宰】邦縣之賦。【註】邦縣四百里。又【地官·小司徒】四甸爲縣。又【遂人】五鄙爲縣。【魯語】三鄕爲縣。【史記·秦始皇本紀】大矣哉，宇縣之中。【註】縣，赤縣。【前漢·地理志】分天下爲郡縣。　又【史記·絳侯世家註】縣官，謂天子也。王者官天下，故曰縣官也。　又姓。【禮·曲禮】縣賁父。【史記·仲尼弟子列傳】縣單父。○按《說文》在?部，今倂入。

暂无。

county
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［xuán］
["Guangyun" Hu Juanqie, Pingxian, Xie. ]
Also known as "県1". Traditional characters for "县1".
(1) Hang up.
(2) Hanging musical instruments in ancient times, such as bells and so on.
(3) The hanging bell and chime.
(4) Tie; tie; tie.
(5) Gap; far.
(6) Reveal; issue.
(7) Offer a reward.
(8) Weighing hammer.
(9) Weigh; measure.
(10) The name of the sacrifice.
(11) Last name. There are counties in the Spring and Autumn Period. See "Historical Records · Biography of Zhongni's Disciples".
[②]［xiàn］
["Guangyun" Huang Lianqie, go to ha, box. ]
Also known as "県2". Traditional characters for "县2".
(1) The place where the emperor lived in ancient times.
(2) The name of the local administrative division. There are counties in the week. During the Spring and Autumn Period, Qin, Jin, Chu and other big countries will annex land and set up counties, so the counties are mostly in the border areas. Later, countries moved the county system inward and set up counties in remote areas. After the Qin unified the Six Kingdoms, the counties were ruled by prefectures, which has been the result of the past. After the Sui and Tang Dynasties, the county was subordinate to the prefecture or state. After the Revolution of 1911, it was directly affiliated to the provinces and special regions. After liberation, it was either subordinate to a province, autonomous region, or municipality directly under the Central Government, or subordinate to an autonomous prefecture, or provincial city.
(3) It is said that the place is the county.
(4) The extension refers to the occupation of other countries' land.
(5) County officials.
(6) Especially refers to Chixian County.

Today's common people pay more attention, don't make suspension, righteousness has nothing to gain. [Yi·Ci] The county's image is written by the sun, and it is more than the sun and the moon. 【Poem·Zhou Song】Yingtian County Drum. 【Zhou Li·Chunguan·Xiaoxu】Position of Zhengle County. [Rituals and Yanli] Leren County. [Zuo Zhuan·Two Years] Fanying in Quxian County. [Pre-Han · Gao Di Ji] The county is separated by thousands of miles.　[Guangyun] Huang Lianqie [Jiyun] Fluorescent silk cut,? Yin Hyun. [Positive rhyme] The shape is sharp and the sound is present. [Release name] County, hanging also, hanging tied to the county. [Guang Yun] Ancient works of Huan. Also【Landguan·Little Situ】Sidian is the county. Also 【Suiren】Five Di is a county. [Lu language] Three countries are counties. 【Historical Records·Benji of Qin Shihuang】It's great, in Yu County. [Note] County, Chi County. [Former Han Geography] The world is divided into counties and counties.　 [Historical Records·Jianghou Family Note] County magistrate, the emperor is also. The king is official in the world, so it is also called county official.　Another last name. 【Li·Qu Li】Ben Father of County.
